Text:
This torrent is not working. Just download the original document for free from the original website:

Mirroring a Censored WordPress Blog: a Guide to Global Voices Advocacy
http://advocacy.globalvoicesonline.org/2010/04/22/guide-mirroring-a-censored-wordpress-blog/

PDF download:

http://advocacy.globalvoicesonline.org/wp-content/plugins/download-monitor/download.php?id=21

It looks like the online version is slightly different from what is being offered in this torrent (beware). Otherwise, I would have seeded the copy I downloaded.
